src: „Nyní máme čtyřměsíční myši bez cukrovky, které ji dříve měly,“ dodal.
mt: “Now we have four-month-old mice without diabetes, who had it before,” he added.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: Dr. Ehud Ur, profesor medicíny na Dalhousieově univerzitě v Halifaxu v Novém Skotsku a zároveň předseda klinické a vědecké divize Kanadské diabetické asociace upozornil, že výzkum je teprve ve svých počátcích.
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association, cautioned that the research is still in its infancy.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: Stejně jako někteří další experti je skeptický ohledně toho, zda je možné diabetes vyléčit. Poukazuje na to, že tato zjištění se netýkají lidí, kteří již mají diabetes 1. typu.
mt: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured. He points out that these findings do not apply to people who already have type 1 diabetes.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: Sara Danius, stálá tajemnice Nobelovy komise pro literaturu na Švédské akademii, v pondělí skrze rádiový pořad na švédském Sveriges Radio veřejně oznámila, že po marné snaze přímo zkontaktovat Boba Dylana po jeho výhře Nobelovy ceny za literaturu v roce 2016 komise zanechává svých snah o jeho zkontaktování.
mt: Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, announced publicly on Monday through a radio show on Swedish Radio that after a failed attempt to directly contact Bob Dylan after his 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature win, the committee is giving up on its efforts to contact him.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: Danius uvedl: „Právě teď neděláme nic. Volal jsem a posílal e-maily jeho nejbližšímu spolupracovníkovi a obdržel jsem velmi přátelské odpovědi. Prozatím to rozhodně stačí.“
mt: Danius said: "Right now we're not doing anything. I've called and emailed his closest collaborator and received very friendly responses. For now that's certainly enough."
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: Jamie Siminoff, výkonný ředitel Ring, dříve uvedl, že jeho firma byla založena poté, co v dílně ve své garáži neslyšel zvuk dveřního zvonku.
mt: Jamie Siminoff, CEO of Ring, previously said his company was founded after he didn't hear the sound of a doorbell in his garage workshop.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: Uvedl, že vytvořil dveřní zvonek přes WiFi.
mt: He said he created a doorbell over WiFi.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Siminoff uvedl, že prodej vzrostl po jeho vystoupení v epizodě Shark Tank v roce 2013, kde vedení pořadu odmítlo financování startupu.
mt: Siminoff said sales increased after his appearance on the show Shark Tank in 2013, where the show's producers rejected funding for the startup.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: Na konci roku 2017 se Siminoff objevil na teleshoppingovém kanálu QVC.
mt: 2017, Siminoff appeared on the teleshopping channel QVC.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Ring také vyřešil soudní spor s konkurenční bezpečnostní firmou ADT Corporation.
mt: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competitor ADT Corporation.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Ačkoli se jedna experimentální vakcína jeví schopná snižovat smrtelnost eboly, až dosud nebyla u žádných léků jasně prokázána vhodnost k léčbě stávající infekce.
mt: Although one experimental vaccine appears to reduce ebola mortality, none of the drugs has yet been shown to be effective in treating an existing infection.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: Jeden koktejl protilátek, ZMapp, vypadal zpočátku slibně, ale formální studie naznačovaly, že měl v zabránění úmrtí menší užitek, než o jaký bylo usilováno.
mt: One cocktail of antibodies, ZMapp, looked promising at first, but formal studies suggested it had less utility in preventing death than was hoped for.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: Při testu PALM sloužil produkt ZMapp jako kontrolní přípravek. Jinak řečeno, vědci jej použili jako výchozí bod pro porovnání tří dalších druhů léčby.
mt: During the PALM trial, the ZMapp product was used as a control. In other words, scientists used it as a baseline for comparing three other types of treatment.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: USA Gymnastics podporuje dopis Olympijské komisi Spojených států a uznává naprostou potřebu Olympijské rodiny propagovat bezpečné prostředí pro všechny naše atlety.
mt: USA Gymnastics supports the letter from the United States Olympic Committee and recognizes the absolute need for the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all our athletes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: Souhlasíme s prohlášením Olympijského výboru Spojených států amerických, že zájmy našich sportovců, jejich oddílů a samotných sportů budou lépe chráněny, pokud podpoříme smysluplné změny v rámci naší organizace, a nikoli pokud organizace ztratí oficiální pravomoci.
mt: We agree with the statement of the United States Olympic Committee that the interests of our athletes, their teams and the sports themselves will be better protected if we support meaningful changes within our organization, and not if the organization loses its official authority.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: Gymnastický výbor USA podporuje nezávislé vyšetřování, které by pomohlo osvětlit, jak mohlo tak rozsáhlé obtěžování, jež oběti Larryho Nassara tak statečně popisovaly, zůstat tak dlouhou dobu bez povšimnutí. Dále také vítá veškeré potřebné změny.
mt: The USA Gymnastics Board of Directors supports an independent investigation that would help shed light on how such widespread abuse, which the victims of Larry Nassar so bravely described, could have gone unnoticed for so long. It also welcomes any necessary changes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: USA Gymnastics a USOC mají stejný cíl – aby byla gymnastika a další sporty co nejbezpečnější pro sportovce, aby mohli jít za svým snem v bezpečném, pozitivním a vstřícném prostředí.
mt: USA Gymnastics and USOC have the same goal – to make gymnastics and other sports as safe as possible for athletes, so they can pursue their dreams in a safe, positive and welcoming environment.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Během 60. let 20. století pracoval Brzezinski pro Johna F. Kennedyho jako jeho poradce a poté pro administrativu Lyndona B. Johnsona.
mt: During the 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his adviser and then for the administration of Lyndon B. Johnson.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: Během výběrů v roce 1976 radil Carterovi v oblasti zahraniční politiky, poté od roku 1977 do roku 1981 působil jako poradce pro národní bezpečnost (NSA), kde nahradil Henryho Kissingera.
mt: 1976 Carter advised on foreign policy, then from 1977 to 1981 served as national security adviser (NSA), replacing Henry Kissinger.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: V NSA pomáhal Carterovi při diplomatickém řešení světových záležitostí, jako jsou Dohody z Camp Davidu (1978); normalizace vztahů mezi USA a Čínou na konci 70. let; íránská revoluce, která vedla k zadržení amerických rukojmí v Íránu (1979); a sovětská invaze v Afghánistánu (1979).
mt: In the NSA, Carter helped Carter with diplomatic solutions to world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords (1978); normalization of relations between the United States and China at the end of the 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the detention of American hostages in Iran (1979); and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan (1979).
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Film, ve kterém hrají Ryan Gosling a Emma Stone, obdržel nominace ve všech hlavních kategoriích.
mt: 2016 film starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone received nominations in all major categories.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Gosling a Stoneová získali nominace na nejlepšího herce a nejlepší herečku.
mt: Gosling and Stone were nominated for best actor and best actress.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: K dalším nominacím patří: nejlepší film, režie, kamera, návrh kostýmů, střih, původní hudba, výprava a dekorace, střih zvuku, zvukový mix a původní scénář.
mt: Other nominations include: best picture, director, cinematography, costume design, editing, original score, production design, sound editing, sound mixing and original screenplay.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: Dvě písně z filmu Audition (The Fools Who Dream) a City of Stars získaly nominace na nejlepší originální píseň. Studio Lionsgate získalo 26 nominací – více než jakékoli jiné studio.
mt: 2 songs from the film Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars received nominations for best original song. Studio Lionsgate received 26 nominations – more than any other studio.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: V neděli pak prezident Spojených států Donald Trump v prohlášení vydaném přes tiskového mluvčího oznámil, že se americká vojska stáhnou ze Sýrie.
mt: On Sunday, U.S. President Donald Trump announced in a statement released through a press spokesman that U.S. forces would be withdrawn from Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: K oznámení došlo poté, co měl Trump telefonický hovor s tureckým prezidentem Recepem Tayyipem Erdoğanem.
mt: The announcement came after Trump had a phone call with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: Turecko také převezme ostrahu zajatých bojovníků ISIS, které dle prohlášení odmítly evropské národy repatriovat.
mt: Turkey will also take custody of captured ISIS fighters, which according to a statement refused to repatriate European nations.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Tato skutečnost nejen potvrzuje, že přinejmenším někteří dinosauři měli peří (tato teorie je již rozšířená), ale také poskytuje podrobnosti, které fosílie obecně nemohou poskytnout, například o barevném a trojrozměrném uspořádání.
mt: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers (this theory is already widespread), but also provides details that fossils in general cannot provide, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: Vědci tvrdí, že peří tohoto zvířete bylo kaštanově hnědé svrchu s bledou nebo karotenově zbarvenou spodní stranou.
mt: Scientists say the bird's plumage was chestnut brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: Objev také poskytuje náhled do problematiky vývoje peří u ptáků.
mt: The discovery also provides a glimpse into the evolution of feathers in birds.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: Protože dinosauří peří nemá příliš vyvinutý osten, kterému se říká rachis, ale má jiné znaky - paprsky a háčky- výzkumníci usoudili, že rachis se pravděpodobně evolučně vyvinula později než tyto ostatní znaky.
mt: Because the dinosaur feathers lacked a well-developed rachis, but had other features - barbs and barbules - researchers concluded that the rachis probably evolved later than these other features.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: Struktura peří naznačuje, že nebyla používána za letu, ale spíše pro regulaci teploty nebo předvádění.  Vědci předpokládají, že i když se jedná o ocas mladého dinosaura, vzorek ukazuje dospělé peří a nikoliv mláděte.
mt: The structure of the feathers suggests they were not used for flight, but rather for temperature regulation or display.  Scientists believe, although the specimen is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult feathers and not juveniles.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Vědci předpokládají, že i když se jedná o ocas mladého dinosaura, představuje vzorek opeření dospělého zvířete a nikoli prachové peří mláděte.
mt: Scientists believe that even though it is the tail of a young dinosaur, it represents a specimen of adult feathering and not downy plumage of a hatchling.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Bomba ve voze, která explodovala poblíž policejního velitelství v tureckém Gaziantepu včera ráno, zabila dva policisty a zranila více než 20 dalších lidí.
mt: A bomb in a car that exploded near a police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey, yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than 20 others.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: Úřad guvernéra uvedl, že devatenáct zraněných bylo policejními důstojníky.
mt: 19 injured were police officers.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: Policie uvedla, že ze spáchání útoku podezírá údajného bojovníka Islámského státu.
mt: Police say they suspect a suspected Islamic State fighter of carrying out the attack.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Zjistili, že Slunce funguje na stejném základním principu jako jiné hvězdy: aktivita všech hvězd v systému je zjevně určována jejich světelností, rotací a ničím jiným.
mt: They found that the Sun works on the same basic principle as other stars: the activity of all stars in the system is apparently determined by their luminosity, rotation, and nothing else.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: Na základě svítivosti a rotace se určuje Rossbyho číslo hvězdy, které souvisí s tokem plazmatu.
mt: Based on brightness and rotation, the Rossby number of a star is determined, which is related to the flow of plasma.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: Čím je Rossbyho číslo menší, tím méně aktivní je hvězda z hlediska magnetického obratu.
mt: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star is in terms of magnetic rotation.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Během své cesty se Iwasaki mnohokrát dostal do potíží.
mt: During his journey, Iwasaki got into trouble many times.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: Byl oloupen piráty, v Tibetu na něj zaútočil pes se vzteklinou, v Nepálu unikl sňatku a v Indii byl zatčen.
mt: 1. He was kidnapped by pirates, 2. In Tibet a dog with rabies attacked him, 3. In Nepal he escaped a marriage and 4. In India he was arrested.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Standard 802.11n operuje na frekvencích 2.4Ghz i 5.0Ghz.
mt: 802.11n operates on both 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Tak bude možná zpětná kompatibilita s normami 802.11a, 802.11b a 802.11g za předpokladu, že základna má duální vysílač.
mt: 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g backward compatibility may be possible, assuming the base station has a dual transmitter.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: Rychlosti 802.11n jsou podstatně vyšší než v případě jeho předchůdců s maximální teoretickou propustností 600 Mbit/s.
mt: 802.11n speeds are significantly higher than its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600 Mbit/s.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Duvall, který je ženatý a má dvě dospělé děti, neudělal velký dojem na Millera, kterého se příběh týkal.
mt: Duvall, who is married and has two adult children, did not impress Miller, who the story was about.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: Při dotazu na komentář Miller řekl: „Mike při slyšení mluví hodně... Připravoval jsem se, a tak jsem úplně neslyšel, co říkal.“
mt: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike was talking a lot at the hearing... I was preparing, so I didn't hear everything he said."
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: „Pokusíme se snížit emise oxidu uhličitého na jednotku HDP o význačný rozdíl z úrovně v roce 2005 do roku 2020,“ řekl Hu.
mt: "We will try to reduce carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a significant difference from the level in 2005 to 2020," Hu said.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: Ohledně omezení neuvedl žádné číslo a řekl, že bude stanoveno na základě ekonomického výkonu Číny.
mt: He did not give any number and said it would be based on China's economic performance.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: Hu povzbuzoval rozvojové země, aby „se vyhýbaly starým způsobům, kdy nejdříve dojde ke znečištění a až poté k čištění.“
mt: Hu encouraged developing countries to “avoid the old ways of first polluting and then cleaning up.”
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: Dodal, že by „však neměli být žádáni o převzetí povinností, které přesahují jejich fázi vývoje, odpovědnost a schopnosti.“
mt: He added that they "should not be asked to take on responsibilities that exceed their stage of development, responsibility and ability."
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: Irácká studijní skupina představila svoji zprávu dnes v 12:00 GMT.
mt: The Iraqi Study Group presented its report today at 12:00 GMT.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: Varuje před nemožností zaručit, že jakkoliv cílená aktivita v současném Iráku zastaví sektářské boje, narůstající násilí nebo sklouzávání k chaosu.
mt: Warns against the impossibility of guaranteeing that any targeted activity in contemporary Iraq will halt sectarian strife, rising violence or a slide into chaos.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: Zpráva začíná prosbou o otevřenou debatu a vytvoření konsensu ve Spojených státech o politice vůči Blízkému východu.
mt: The report begins with a request for an open debate and the creation of a consensus in the United States on policy towards the Middle East.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: Zpráva je do velké míry kritická vůči téměř všem aspektům současného postupu exekutivy směrem k Iráku a vyžaduje okamžitou změnu směru.
mt: The report is highly critical of nearly all aspects of the current course of action by the executive branch toward Iraq and demands an immediate change of course.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: První z jeho 78 doporučení je, že před koncem tohoto roku by měla být podniknuta nová diplomatická iniciativa za účelem zajistit hranice Iráku proti nepřátelským intervencím a obnovit diplomatické vztahy s jeho sousedy.
mt: 1 of his 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be undertaken by the end of this year to secure Iraq's borders against hostile interventions and to restore diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Současná senátorka a první dáma Argentiny Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner oznámila svou prezidentskou kandidaturu včera večer v La Plata, městě vzdáleném 50 kilometrů (31 mil) od Buenos Aires.
mt: Current Argentine senator and first lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy last night in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) from Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: Paní Kirchner oznámila svůj záměr ucházet se o prezidentský úřad v Divadle Argentina, tedy na stejném místě, kde v roce 2005 zahájila svou kampaň do Senátu jakožto členka delegace z provincie Buenos Aires.
mt: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to seek the presidency at the Teatro Argentina, the same place where in 2005 she launched her Senate campaign as a member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: "Tuto diskuzi rozvířila kontroverze ohledně výdajů za pomoc a rekonstrukci po hurikánu Katrina; které někteří fiskální konzervativci humorně nazývali ""Bushův novoorleanský úděl."""
mt: "This discussion was sparked by controversy over spending for hurricane Katrina relief and reconstruction, which some fiscal conservatives humorously called the "Bush's New Orleans deal.""
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: Liberální kritika snah o rekonstrukci se soustředila na to, že smlouvy o rekonstrukci vyhrávali domnělí washingtonští zasvěcenci.
mt: Liberal critics of the reconstruction efforts focused on the fact that the reconstruction contracts were won by alleged Washington insiders.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Na pohřeb se do Říma vydalo více než čtyři miliony lidí.
mt: 4 million people attended the funeral in Rome.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: Počet přítomných lidí byl natolik velký, že nebylo možné, aby se všichni dostali na pohřeb na náměstí svatého Petra.
mt: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for all to attend the funeral on St. Peter's Square.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Na různých místech v Římě byly umístěny velké televizní obrazovky, aby lidé mohli sledovat ceremonii.
mt: Large television screens were placed in various locations in Rome so people could watch the ceremony.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: V mnoha dalších městech v Itálii a ve zbytku světa, zejména v Polsku, probíhala podobná promítání, na která se dívalo velké množství lidí.
mt: In many other cities in Italy and the rest of the world, especially in Poland, similar screenings were held, which were watched by a large number of people.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Historici kritizovali minulé postupy FBI za to, že soustředí zdroje na snadno vyřešitelné případy, obzvláště krádeže aut, s úmyslem zvednout statistickou úspěšnost agentury.
mt: Historians criticized past FBI practices for focusing resources on easily solved cases, especially car thefts, with the intent of boosting the agency's statistical success rate.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: Kongres začal financovat iniciativu proti obscénnostem ve fiskálním roce 2005 a stanovil, že FBI musí vyhradit 10 agentů zabývajících se pornografií dospělých.
mt: 2005 was the first year Congress funded the initiative against obscenity and required the FBI to set aside 10 agents to deal with adult pornography.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Robin Uthappa dosáhl nejvyššího skóre za směnu, kdy za 70 výpadů při pouhých 41 míčích hodil 11 čtyřek a 2 šestky.
mt: Robin Uthappa achieved the highest score for the innings, when in 70 balls with just 41 balls he hit 11 fours and 2 sixes.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: Střední odpalovači Sachin Tendulkar a Rahul Dravid si vedli dobře a uzavřeli stotisícové partnerství.
mt: Middle-order batsmen Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid played well and closed a century partnership.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Po ztrátě branky kapitána však Indie získala pouze 36 bodů a ztratila 7 branek, čímž ukončila směnu.
mt: After losing the captain's goal, India gained only 36 points and lost 7 goals, thus ending the shift.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: Americký prezident George W. Bush dorazil do Singapuru ráno 16. listopadu a zahájil týdenní cestu po Asii.
mt: 16 November 2006: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore early this morning and began a week-long tour of Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: Byl přivítán singapurským místopředsedou vlády Wong Kan Sengem a se singapurským premiérem Lee Hsien Loongem diskutoval otázky obchodu a terorismu.
mt: He was welcomed by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed issues of trade and terrorism with Singapore's Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Po ztrátovém týdnu při pololetních volbách Bush informoval publikum o rozšíření trhu v Asii.
mt: After a losing week in the midterm elections, Bush told the audience about expanding markets in Asia.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: "Předseda vlády Stephen Harper souhlasil, že vládní ""Vyhlášku o čistém vzduchu"" předloží ke kontrole výboru všech stran před jejím druhým čtením, a to po úterním 25minutovém setkání s lídrem NDP Jackem Laytonem v projektové kanceláři. "
mt: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper agreed to have the government's "Clean Air Act" referred to a committee of all parties before its second reading, after a 25-minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton in his project office."
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: Layton požádal při setkání s ministerským předsedou o změny konzervativci navrženého zákona o ochraně životního prostředí, konkrétně požadoval „naprosté a kompletní přepracování“ zákona o ochraně životního prostředí z dílny Konzervativní strany.
mt: Layton asked for changes to the Conservative Party's proposed Environment Protection Act at a meeting with the prime minister, specifically asking for "a complete and total reworking" of the Environment Protection Act.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Od doby, kdy federální vláda převzala financování nemocnice Mersey v Devonportu v Tasmánii, vláda státu a někteří federální poslanci kritizovali tento čin jako pouhé gesto předcházející federálním volbám, které měly být vyhlášeny v listopadu.
mt: Since the federal government took over funding of the Mersey Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised the move as a mere gesture preceding federal elections, which were to be held in November.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Premiér John Howard ale uvedl, že cílem byla pouze ochrana zařízení nemocnice před snížením úrovně tasmánskou vládou, a to poskytnutím dalších 45 milionů AUD.
mt: Prime Minister John Howard said the aim was only to protect the hospital from the Tasmanian government's reduction in funding, by providing an additional $45 million AUD.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: Podle posledního bulletinu naznačovalo sledování mořské hladiny vznik tsunami. Jednoznačná aktivita tsunami byla zaznamenána poblíž Pago Pago a Niue.
mt: According to the latest bulletin, tsunami monitoring indicated a tsunami was underway.  A definite tsunami was observed near Pago Pago and Niue.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: V Tonze nebyly hlášeny žádné velké škody ani zranění, ale došlo k dočasnému výpadku energie, což údajně zabránilo tonžským orgánům, aby přijaly varování před tsunami vydané PTWC.
mt: There were no major damage or injuries reported in Tonga, but there was a temporary power outage, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving a tsunami warning issued by PTWC.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: Čtrnáct škol na Havaji nacházejících se na pobřeží nebo v jeho blízkosti bylo celou středu zavřeno i přesto, že varování byla odvolána.
mt: 14 schools on Hawaii located on or near the coast were closed all Wednesday despite the warning being rescinded.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Americký prezident George W. Bush toto oznámení uvítal.
mt: American President George W. Bush welcomed this announcement.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Bushův mluvčí Gordon Johndroe nazval slib Severní Koreje „významným krokem k cíli dosažení ověřitelné denuklearizace Korejského poloostrova.“
mt: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a significant step toward the goal of verifiable denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula."
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: Dnes se v Atlantském oceánu zformovala desátá pojmenovaná bouře sezony atlantických hurikánů, subtropická bouře Jerry.
mt: Today, the tenth named storm of the Atlantic hurricane season, subtropical storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: Národní centrum pro hurikány (NHC) tvrdí, že v tuto chvíli Jerry nepředstavuje žádnou hrozbu pro pevninu.
mt: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says Jerry does not currently pose any threat to the mainland.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: Americký technický sbor odhaduje, že 15 cm dešťových srážek by mohlo vést k protržení již poškozených hrází.
mt: 15 cm of rain could cause the levees to break, which are already damaged.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: Ninth Ward, které bylo během hurikánu Katrina zaplaveno do výšky 20 stop, má nyní vody po pás dospělého člověka, protože blízká protipovodňová hráz přetekla.
mt: 9th Ward, which was flooded to a depth of 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, now has water up to the ankles of an adult man, as a nearby levee has breached.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: Přes hráz přetéká voda na úseku širokém 30 metrů.
mt: 30 meters of the dam is overtopped by water.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Správce Commons Adam Cuerden vyjádřil svou frustraci nad smazánými daty v rozhovoru pro Wikinews z minulého měsíce.
mt: Commons administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over deleted data in an interview with Wikinews last month.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: „On [Wales] nám v podstatě lhal od začátku. Zaprvé tím, že jednal, jako by to bylo z právních důvodů. Zadruhé předstíráním, že nás poslouchá, až do smazání děl.“
mt: “On [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if it was a legal matter. Second, by pretending to listen to us, until the deal was done.”
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: Rozhořčení komunity vedlo k současnému úsilí o přípravu pravidel týkajících se sexuálního obsahu pro webovou stránku, která obsahuje miliony médií s otevřenou licencí.
mt: The community's outrage led to a current effort to prepare rules regarding sexual content for the website, which contains millions of media with open licenses.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Práce byla většinou teoretická, ale byl napsán program s cílem simulovat pozorování galaxie Sagittarius.
mt: The work was mostly theoretical, but a program was written to simulate observations of the galaxy Sagittarius.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Tým pátral po jevu, který by byl způsoben přílivovými silami mezi temnou hmotou této galaxie a temnou hmotou Mléčné dráhy.
mt: The team was looking for an effect that would be caused by tidal forces between the dark matter of this galaxy and the dark matter of the Milky Way.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Stejně jako Měsíc působí silou na Zemi a způsobuje příliv a odliv mořské hladiny, působí Mléčná dráha silou na Galaxii Střelce.
mt: As the Moon affects the Earth and causes tides in the ocean, the Milky Way affects the Galaxy of Orion.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Vědci dospěli k závěru, že temná hmota ovlivňuje jinou temnou hmotu stejným způsobem jako běžná hmota.
mt: Scientists have concluded that dark matter affects other dark matter in the same way as ordinary matter.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Tato teorie říká, že většina temné hmoty v galaxii se nachází kolem galaxie v jakési „svatozáři“ a skládá se ze spousty malých částic.
mt: This theory says that most of the dark matter in the galaxy is located around the galaxy in a "halo" and consists of a multitude of small particles.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Televizní reportáže ukazují bílý kouř stoupající z elektrárny.
mt: Television reports show white smoke rising from the power plant.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: Místní úřady varují obyvatele v blízkosti továrny, aby nevycházeli z domů, vypnuli si klimatizaci a nepili kohoutkovou vodu.
mt: Local officials warn residents near the factory not to go outside, turn off air conditioning and not drink tap water.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: Podle japonské jaderné agentury bylo v závodě identifikováno radioaktivní cesium a jód.
mt: According to the Japanese nuclear agency, radioactive cesium and iodine were identified at the plant.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: Podle spekulací úřadů by to mohlo být náznakem toho, že zdejší nádoby s uranovým palivem mohly prasknout a palivo nyní uniká.
mt: According to speculation by officials, this may be a sign that the local uranium fuel tanks may have burst and the fuel is now leaking.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Dr. Tony Moll objevil tuberkulózu (XDR-TB) extrémně odolnou vůči lékům v jihoafrickém regionu KwaZulu-Natal.
mt: Dr. Tony Moll discovered extremely drug-resistant tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the KwaZulu-Natal region of South Africa.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: V rozhovoru uvedl, že nová varianta je „vysoce znepokojivá, až alarmující, z důvodu vysoké zhoubnosti.“
mt: In an interview, he said the new variant is "highly alarming, even alarming, due to its high malignancy."
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Doktor Moll si myslí, že někteří pacienti mohli tento virus chytit v nemocnici, a nejméně dva z nich byli nemocniční zdravotníci.
mt: Dr. Moll believes some patients may have contracted this virus in the hospital, and at least two of them were hospital health workers.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
